explanation: [0-0] Against a green background, a man in a white T-shirt is holding a potato chip in his right hand, with most of the chip still inside the tube. Behind him, another man wearing a mask, dressed in a white T-shirt and brown pants, is looking forward.

[0-4] The man in the white T-shirt takes the potato chip out of the tube, and the chip catches fire. He then blows out the fire. The camera zooms in as the man puts the potato chip in his mouth and eats it with his eyes closed. Next, the man reaches into the chip tube, takes his hand out, and looks inside the tube.

[9-11] Then, the masked man hits the man in the white T-shirt on the head from behind. The man grimaces in pain and rubs his head with his hand. The masked man points to the bottom of the chip tube.

[11-16] The man in the white T-shirt then places the chip tube upright on a table. The masked man holds a spray bottle and sprays a yellow liquid onto the man's hand. The camera zooms in on the yellow liquid flowing from the man's hand into the chip tube. The camera zooms out as the man pulls his hand out. Finally, the man gives a thumbs-up with his right hand and smiles towards the front, while the masked man points to the spray bottle containing the yellow liquid with both hands.
